PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_BoilerTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Boiler type common attributes. SoundLevel attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcSoundProperties instead. PrimaryEnergySource and AuxiliaryEnergySource attributes deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcEnergyProperties, IfcFuelProperties, etc. instead.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal pressure rating of the boiler as rated by ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code Section IV, Rules for Construction of Heating Boilers, and Section I, Rules for Construction of Power Boilers

PropertyDef.Name: OperatingMode
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the operating mode of the boiler.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: The primary material used to construct the boiler's heat transfer vessel.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatTransferSurfaceArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Total heat transfer area of the vessel.

PropertyDef.Name: IsWaterStorageHeater
PropertyDef.Definition: This is used to identify if the boiler has storage capacity (TRUE). If FALSE, then there is no storage capacity built into the boiler, such as an instantaneous hot water heater.

PropertyDef.Name: PartialLoadEfficiencyCurves
PropertyDef.Definition: Boiler efficiency as a function of the partial load factor; E = f (partialLaodfactor).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalEfficiency
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal efficiency of the boiler as defined by the manufacturer. For water boilers, a function of inlet versus outlet temperature. For steam boilers, a function of inlet temperature versus steam pressure.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatOutput
PropertyDef.Definition: Total nominal heat output as listed by the Boiler manufacturer. For water boilers, it is a function of inlet versus outlet temperature. For steam boilers, it is a function of inlet temperature versus steam pressure.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable outlet temperature of either the water or the steam.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalEnergyConsumption
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal fuel consumption rate required to produce the total boiler heat output.
